topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Deploying the Role Generator Patches

body.p: Before launching the HP Helion OpenStack cloud (using the hcfgproc command), deploy the following patches to correct the following issues:

ul.li: The floating IP assigned to the HLM VM not pingable with DCNR3 and VSD managed networks.
The installation fails due to excessive ESX logs

ol.li: Download the fip_patch drectory and logrotate_patch directroy and the role-generator file.
Copy the patch files to the ~/ directory on the HLM host.

Change to the kenobi-configuration-processor directory:
cd ~/kenobi-configuration-processor

Execute the following command to deploy the patch:
patch -p1 < ../kcp-windriver-build-15-only.patch patch -p1 < ../knc-horizon-helion-theme-dashboard.patch

Execute the following command to integrate the patches into the installation environment:
cd ~/cg-hlm/hlm-build ./hlm_prepare-env.sh
When the hcfgproc command is executed, the updated configuration file will be used.

body.p: Return to the KVM + ESX installation.
